textAfterTable: Listener comments!   Sun. 1/24/10 12:56am KB: Can you bring Mary forward in time? If so I would take her to the battle field of every religious war relating to Christianity. I would show her all the religious bigotry that has harmed innocent individuals. I would take her to the scene of Mathew Shapard's murder. I would take her to Utah. That would convince her to get an abortion!   Sun. 1/24/10 1:07am ?: The baby Jesus was left unattended, and he became hungry. A demon came by and offered him a bottle of milk. He said to the baby Jesus, " If you partake, you will destroy the world"... and he drank. Also cemetery just sampled tribulations 99   Sun. 1/24/10 1:09am ?: A cold draft, and a black presence enters the room.
